params.text:
• Use the Previous and Next buttons at the bottom of each page to move backward and forward in the course.
  • Use the Course Menu on the left side of each page in the learning platform's Menu bar to navigate through the course.
  • In case the images/elements in the course do not appear in the first instance, refresh the page by clicking the refresh button of your browser for better results.

• Course Type: Online, self-paced.
  • Course Duration: ~30 mins.
  • Target Audience: All global employees
  • Accessibility: PCs, laptops, mobile phones, and tablets.
  • Accessories Required: Earphones / Headphones.
  • Learning Evaluation Method: Course-level, knowledge-testing certification quiz.
